posts.title: 荔枝派安装Ubuntu
posts.text: 主要参考官方文档Lichee zero 文档 和 制作荔枝派Zero开发板 TF/SD卡启动盘 编译uboot安装交叉编译器# 下载编译器 gcc-linaro-6.3.1-2017.05-x86_64_arm-linux-gnueabihf.tar.xz tar xvf gcc-linaro-6.3.1-2017.05-x86_64_arm-linux-gnueabihf.tar.xz vim /etc/bash.bashrc # PATH="$PATH:./gcc-linaro-6.3.1-2017.05-x86_64_arm-linux-gnueabihf/bin" source /etc/bash.bashrc arm-linux-gnueabihf-gcc -v sudo apt-get install device-tree-compiler 下载uboot源码git clone因为网络原因可能会失败，可以下载zip解压 git clone https://github.com/Lichee-Pi/u-boot.git -b v3s-current #or git clone https://github.com/Lichee-Pi/u-boot.git -b v3s-spi-experimental 编译make ARCH=arm CROSS_COMPILE=arm-linux-gnueabihf- LicheePi_Zero_800x480LCD_defconfig #or make ARCH=arm CROSS_COMPILE=arm-linux-gnueabihf- LicheePi_Zero480x272LCD_defconfig #or make ARCH=arm CROSS_COMPILE=arm-linux-gnueabihf- LicheePi_Zero_defconfig make ARCH=arm menuconfig time make ARCH=arm CROSS_COMPILE=arm-linux-gnueabihf- 2>&1 | tee build.log 修改环境变量这里我修改源文件会编译不成功，所以我选择先编译再修改环境变量 setenv bootargs "console=ttyS0,115200 panic=5 rootwait mtdparts=spi32766.0:1M(uboot)ro,64k(dtb)ro,6M(kernel)ro,-(rootfs) root=/dev/mmcblk0p2 earlyprintk rw" setenv bootcmd "setenv bootm_boot_mode sec; load mmc 0:1 0x41000000 zImage;load mmc 0:1 0x41800000 sun8i-v3s-licheepi-zero-dock.dtb;bootz 0x41000000 - 0x41800000; " saveenv 编译linux内核下载源码同样可以下载zip git clone https://github.com/Lichee-Pi/linux.git # 默认zero-4.10.y分支，我用的5.2分支 编译源码make ARCH=arm licheepi_zero_defconfig make ARCH=arm menuconfig make ARCH=arm CROSS_COMPILE=arm-linux-gnueabihf- -j16 make ARCH=arm CROSS_COMPILE=arm-linux-gnueabihf- -j16 INSTALL_MOD_PATH=out modules make ARCH=arm CROSS_COMPILE=arm-linux-gnueabihf- -j16 INSTALL_MOD_PATH=out modules_install 通过otg共享网络目前我也没弄太明白 make ARCH=arm menuconfig 按下图配置 根文件系统下载armhf版的ubuntu-base 如何下载直接百度 下文默认解压完在rootfs文件夹里 安装工具sudo apt-get install qemu-user-static cp /usr/bin/qemu-arm-static rootfs/usr/bin 配置DNS直接把主机的DNS配置复制到下载的根文件系统 cp /etc/resolv.conf rootfs/etc/resolv.conf 修改软件源sudo vim rootfs/etc/qpt/source.list # 这里用的清华源 # 下面为vim命令 :% s/ports.ubuntu.com/mirrors.tuna.tsinghua.edu.cn/g 创建挂载和解挂载脚本挂载#!/bin/bash echo "Mounting file system" mount -t proc /proc /rootfs/proc mount -t sysfs /sys /rootfs/sys mount -o bind /dev /rootfs/dev mount -o bind /dev/pts /rootfs/dev/pts echo "Change root" chroot rootfs/ 解挂载echo "Umounting file system" umount rootfs/proc umount rootfs/sys umount rootfs/dev/pts umount rootfs/dev 挂载根文件系统sudo chmod 777 mount.sh sudo ./mount.sh 设置密码passwd root 设置主机名和hostecho "licheepi"> /etc/hostname echo "127.0.0.1 localhost" > /etc/hosts 添加用户useradd -s '/bin/bash' -m -G adm,sudo pi passwd pi 安装常用软件export LC_ALL=C apt-get update apt-get install sudo apt-get install language-pack-en-base apt-get install ssh apt-get install net-tools apt-get install ethtool apt-get install ifupdown apt-get install iputils-ping apt-get install rsyslog apt-get install htop apt-get install vim chmod 0400 /etc/ssh/ssh_host_*key echo 'PermitRootLogin yes' >> /etc/ssh/sshd_config chmod 设置SSHD的本机私钥，设置其他用户不能修改echo 把root写入到SSHD配置文件里 遇到的问题 我在登陆时遇到了两个问题 不能用su命令 不能用sudo命令 解决办法 chown -R root:root /bin/su chmod u+s /bin/su chown root:root /usr/bin/sudo chmod 4755 /usr/bin/sudo 配置串口调试此处不太清楚按下面就成功了cp /usr/lib/systemd/system/serial-getty@.service /etc/systemd/system/serial-getty@ttyS0.service 修改/etc/systemd/system/serial-getty@ttyS0.service[Service] ExecStart=-/sbin/agetty -o '-p -- \\u' --keep-baud 115200 %I $TERM Type=idle 链接ln -s /etc/systemd/system/serial-getty@ttyS0.service /etc/systemd/system/getty.target.wants/ ln -s /lib/systemd/system/getty@.service /etc/systemd/system/getty.target.wants/getty@ttyS0. service 退出exit sudo ./umount.sh
